stage.description: Stage to which the job belongs in the pipeline.

archived.description: Indicates if the job has been archived.

ref.description: Reference or branch for which the job was triggered.

tag.description: Indicates if the job is tagged.

coverage.description: Code coverage achieved by the job.

allow_failure.description: Specifies if the job is allowed to fail.

created_at.description: Date and time when the job was created.

started_at.description: Date and time when the job execution started.

finished_at.description: Date and time when the job finished execution.

queued_duration.description: Duration for which the job was in the queue.

web_url.description: URL to access the job details on the web platform.

artifacts.description: List of artifacts generated by the job.

artifacts_expire_at.description: Date and time when artifacts will expire.

tag_list.description: List of tags associated with the job.

user.description: Details of the user who triggered the job.

user_id.description: ID of the user who triggered the job.

pipeline.description: Details of the pipeline to which the job belongs.

pipeline_id.description: ID of the pipeline to which the job belongs.

runner.description: Details of the runner on which the job is executed.

runner_id.description: ID of the runner on which the job is executed.

commit.description: Details of the commit associated with the job.

commit_id.description: ID of the commit associated with the job.

project_id.description: ID of the project to which the job belongs.

erased_at.description: Date and time when the job was erased.

failure_reason.description: Reason for job failure, if applicable.

project.description: Details of the project to which the job belongs.

ci_job_token_scope_enabled.description: Indicates if the CI job token scope is enabled for the project.
